Class CommentController

com.example.VaibhavProject.controller.CommentController

      @GetMapping("/delete/{commentId}") public void deleteComment(@PathVariable String commentId)
      deletes comment with given commentid from database

      @GetMapping("/{articleId}") public List<Comment> getComments(@PathVariable String articleId)
